title: WCAS POLI_SCI 390-0-25 Special Topics in Political Science

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Sociology 215-0-20/POLI SCI 390-0-25 "Economy and Society" Professor Nader Sohrabi, Winter 2016
Introduction to sociological approaches to economic life. Topics include property rights, illegal markets, money, economic inequalities, direct sales, and boycotts.

subject: POLI_SCI
